dcterms:creator: Mitchell Marcus
Beatrice Santorini
Mary Ann Marcinkiewicz
dcterms:description: The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) portion of the Penn Treebank (PTB) English dataset contains about 1 million words, used for training various language models and evaluating their performance in speech recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB)

dcterms:creator: Ciprian Chelba
Tomas Mikolov
Mike Schuster
Qi Ge
Thorsten Brants
Phillipp Koehn
Tony Robinson
dcterms:description: The Google one-billion-word dataset is a large-scale dataset used for training language models, containing approximately 0.8 billion words, aimed at evaluating the performance of various language modeling techniques.
dcterms:title: Google one-billion-word dataset
